title: welcome
description: Welcome to Project EDDIE Module 6 'Understanding Uncertainty in Ecological Forecasts' R Shiny App!

title: tab_nav1
description: Navigate through the module by selecting a tab.

title: tab_nav2
description: You can also use these buttons at the bottom of the page to navigate through the tabs.

title: objectives
description: There are objectives on each of the tabs. You will need to complete them sequentially.

title: questions
description: Questions are embedded throughout the app. Answer them in your final report as you go. When prompted, download and copy-paste plots into your final report.

title: finish
description: When you are finished you can generate and download a Word document with your answers and plots.

title: help
description: If you require any further help you can use the help button in the top right corner.

title: start
description: Start from here and make sure to read through all the text carefully and answer the questions as you go.
